omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with BR as (
    select 
        Record ->> '$.LinkagePatientId.NhsNumber.@extension' as NhsNumber,
        coalesce(
            Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.Staging.StageDateIntegratedStage',
            Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.LinkageDiagnosticDetails.DateOfPrimaryDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed'
        ) as MeasurementDate,
        Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.Staging.TnmStageGroupingIntegrated' as TnmStageGroupingIntegrated
    from omop_staging.cosd_staging_901
    where type = 'BR'
)
select distinct
    NhsNumber,
    MeasurementDate,
    TnmStageGroupingIntegrated
from BR
where TnmStageGroupingIntegrated is not null;

omopColumns.name: measurement_date

dataSource.name: MeasurementDate
dataSource.description: The date of the staging measurement, either the integrated stage date or diagnosis date as fallback.

origins.origin: STAGE DATE INTEGRATED STAGE / DATE OF PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED)

omopColumns.name: measurement_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32828`. EHR episode record

omopColumns.name: measurement_concept_id

dataSource.name: TnmStageGroupingIntegrated
dataSource.description: The TNM stage grouping (combined T, N, M categories) of the integrated stage.
